title: Can I remove Swain from my champions?
body: After the rework I would like Swain removed from my champions. Does Riot support do that?

replies.body:
We certainly can! Shoot us a quick [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) letting us know that you're okay with Swain being removed from this account. 

I'm curious though, which parts of the rework don't you like? I've got some opinions myself but I still can't quite decide if I prefer this over the old style. Gotta admit this new look is sweet though xD

I want it too :/

Why? I like UNIQUE champs,  my fav champs actually are:

{{champion:89}} - She is awesome, and I think who she want to be in peace with Diana, is strong and was love at first sight.

this ones are my fav champs actually, and Swain use to have a place close to they, in fact actually (untill rework) I love him.

{{champion:50}} - Was a common man, who out of nowhere, to take the command of Noxus, in regular Noxus terms, he should be dead, but he knows to play his cards and won.

and is not just the story, each of this character have something about his design and skills very unique.
